Program_Title: Rep. James Lankford (R-OK) Speaks During Pro-Life Special Order of Congress

Headlines: Freshman Rep. James Lankford (R-OK) speaks about the horrors of abortion and the humanity of an unborn child. Rep. Lankford makes clear that it is an undeniable truth that it is an unborn life in the mother's womb, not just an embryo - they are a person.
